column5: Well, they are finally here spawning in the rivers, it's only 2 days later than the last three years that I recorded, so it's back on scedual by the looks of it. The ice was only out for one day before they came in yesterday.    I'll try to get some pics up later, I seen some monsters in there, can't wait, couple more weeks they will be on our lines.
Way to go! Can't wait to catch some!
Be good to see those pictures, Gbay
Lookin' forward to the pics man!!!
good to know!!!,,,means they'll be feeding by the time we get up for the opener on quinte!!!
